column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: An unknown car crashed into a PCX motorcycle
column4: injuring a man and killing his girlfriend at 1:00 am
column7: along the corner of 143th Street 31st in Boeng Keng Kang 3
column9: Phnom Penh.------The victim’s body was identified as Kris Dalen
column11: known for her Facebook modelling style under the name ------Ah Jruy------.------Witnesses said the motorcycle was traveling down 310 Street from the west. A black car of unknown model was traveling along Highway 143 at a  speed from the south
column12: crashed into the PCX and dragged  the motorcycle over 50 meters. ------Immediately after the crash
column13: the car drove away. The man
column15: told reporters that the woman was his girlfriend and he was taken away in an ambulance. ------NKD
